teams.name: University of Pennsylvania
teams.loan_because: we are Quakers!
teams.description: "I do not pretend to give such a Sum; I only lend it to you. When you meet with another honest Man in similar Distress, you must pay me by lending this Sum to him; enjoining him to discharge the Debt by a like operation, when he shall be able, and shall meet with another opportunity. I hope it may thus go thro' many hands, before it meets with a Knave that will stop its Progress. This is a trick of mine for doing a deal of good with a little money." ....i.e. Pay it Forward.  -- Ben Franklin, in a letter to Benjamin Webb dated April 22, 1784

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Hamburg
teams.loan_because: we believe that entrepreneurship can start with small steps and develop to support and enhance whole communities.
teams.description:
We are a team for everyone originating from or loving Hamburg, a beautiful city in northern Germany.
Ein Team für alle Hamburger Deerns un Jungs und alle die es gerne wären.

teams.name: Team Virginia
teams.loan_because: We give new meaning to the phrase "Commonwealth of Virginia."  We Virginians are thrilled to pool our common resources to help entrepreneurs all over the world as they improve their lives and their communities.
teams.description:
From the Appalachian Mountains to Virginia Beach (and equally welcoming of members outside the state), we are enthusiastic Kiva lenders privileged to have ties to the great state of Virginia. 
( Photo Copyright 2007 D L Ennis all rights reserved http://dlennis.wordpress.com )

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.name: Kiva Jews
teams.loan_because: Tikkun Olam - making the world a better place.
teams.description: One of Judaism's most famous scholars, Maimonides, said that the highest form of charity is to help someone no longer need charity - and lending to Kiva does that.

teams.name: Kiva Team Germany
teams.loan_because: Showing interest in the life of others and giving a helping hand if needed is important.
teams.description: We are some fellows from Germany who believe in the concept of Kiva.

teams.name: Kiva Buddhists
teams.loan_because: We water seeds of awakening.
teams.description: We are Buddhists of all variety, but focus here is on the way of the Boddhisatva.

teams.name: University of Wisconsin-Madison
teams.loan_because: We believe we can make a change in this world.
teams.description: Students, staff, faculty, and alumni of University of Wisconsin-Madison get together to participate in microfinancing.  We are very enthusiastic about it.

teams.name: Purple Moose
teams.loan_because: We love fun & funky socks and believe in changing the world, a little at a time.
teams.description: The official Kiva team for the Purple Moose Sock Company, based in London, ON Canada. Friends, customers, family and anyone with a passion for the Purple Moose named Booglaoo are welcome!  Fun & funky sock retailer, soon a micro-enterprise manufacturing socks locally and 5 year plan to return to Sri Lanka and start an employee owned co-op. Love the sock madness!

teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: LOTUS: Lend Out To Uplift Self-sufficiency
teams.loan_because: We care about people striving to enhance their economic self-sufficiency and wish to support their entrepreneurial endeavors. It just takes one small step by each of us lending on kiva. Together we can make it easier for hard working people to get the much-needed capital to sustain and grow their business. We feel blessed to be able to support the aspirations of so many loan recipients who persevere tenaciously for a better quality of life with dignity. Kudos to Kiva.org that allows us to connect for this common cause.
teams.description:
In our team, we have a vision to change lives in novel ways. Our team's origin began with a Kiva Card (gift certificate) whose recipient founded this team. Inspired by Kiva Fellow, Jessica Heinzelman's talk, our founder dreamed to take us on a cruise, beyond the realm of lending targets and team statistics. Frequent & occasional lenders are free to choose who to lend to, how much and when in an amiable team ambience nurtured by Kiva Fellows, Kiva Editor & Translators, artists, writers, entrepreneurs, workers, retired people, families, parent + kid(s), students, teachers, and professionals. Our diversity & portfolio enable our discovery of social values inherent in the Kiva micro-lending ecosystem whose issues we debate objectively. Experienced members are gratified to enhance our grasp of nuances in lending. We wish to work with volunteers in the team, Kiva Friends, http://kivafriends.org and our supporters to engage in activities that promote Kiva. Our journey to strengthen and grow the Kiva ecosystem has room for more. JOIN NOW, and check out our team, to convince yourself that it can be your team too.

LINKS TO SEE ALSO:
1. Kiva Updates:http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva 
2. KF Blogs:http://www.kiva.org/updates/fellows 

(Thanks Anh D Pham for letting LOTUS team on Kiva to use the exquisite image of the lotus flower you photographed in Vietnam)

teams.name: Tampa Bay, Florida
teams.loan_because: We are a diverse group of Kiva members who share a connection by living in the Tampa Bay, Florida area.  We also want to make the world a better place.
teams.description:
The Tampa Bay area includes the following major towns and cities:  



Anna Maria, Apollo Beach, Balm, Belleair, Boca Ciega, Boyette, Bradenton, Brandon, Carrollwood, Citrus Park, Clearwater, Clearwater Beach, Dade City, Dover, Dunedin, Durant, Gibsonton, Gulfport, Indian Rocks Beach, Innisbrook, Land O' Lakes, Largo, Lithia, Longboat Key, Lutz, Kathleen, Madeira Beach, Mango, New Port Richey, Odessa, Oldsmar, Palm Harbor, Palm River, Palma Ceia, Palmetto, Pasco, Pinellas Park, Progress Village, Redington Beach, Riverview, Ruskin, Safety Harbor, Saint Pete Beach, Saint Petersburg, Sarasota, Seffner, Seminole, South Tampa, Sun City Center, Tampa, Tarpon Springs, Temple Terrace, Tierra Verde, Town 'n' Country, Treasure Island, Valrico, West Chase, Wimauma, and Zephyrhills.

teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.

teams.name: Women Cheering Women
teams.loan_because:
as former UN Secretary Kofi Annan believes, ultimately women are the ones who will change the world.  

So join the team and let's prove him right!
teams.description: a sisterhood connecting women around the globe with love, encouragement and support - for all of us, entrepreneurs and lenders alike.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Kent Kivas
teams.loan_because: we can.
teams.description: For those of us born south of the Medway.

teams.name: MAXIMA Mikroheranhvatho Fan Club
teams.loan_because: We believe in MAXIMA, their clients, their staff, and most importantly believe in their vision to: "bring together people and businesses with the common goal of alleviating poverty by providing both economic and social opportunities to the rural poor."
teams.description: We are a team focused on lending to MAXIMA clients to help MAXIMA fulfill its mission to "offer microfinance services to low-income individuals, groups, and small & medium enterprises (SMEs), with an emphasis on lending to poor, rural women in addition to promoting savings."

teams.name: tumblr.
teams.loan_because: we are tired of seeing society do nothing about our world in need.  We are tired of feeling like "armchair activists"... We are doing.
teams.description:
We are a group of like-minded individuals who have found each other on the blogging site: tumblr.
We want to help out with eliminating Global poverty even if our lives are too busy to be more active.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Kiva Austin Texas
teams.loan_because: We are big-hearted Texans and citizens of the world who enjoy sharing our prosperity and making a positive difference in the world.
teams.description:
a delightfully diverse group of Austinites. Be proud, Team Austin--our Kiva team is second only to NYC (with nearly 4X as many members!) for total lending for a city team. 
And a hearty WELCOME!! to all our new members.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Kiva Site Feature Suggestions
teams.loan_because: We are one large global community and we can help each other out.
teams.description: A general forum to discuss future features to get feedback and suggestions. You may want to set the team email preferences to once-a-day if you don't want to get flooded. Please do not use this team to discuss policy suggestions or bug reports for Kiva. This is run by one of the engineers who just wants a channel to get lender feedback about site features and functionality. For suggestions about policy changes or bug reports, email contactus@kiva.org

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Disabled Persons
teams.loan_because: This is a community of people interested in making a difference for entrepreneurs  and families who are affected by illness or physical, intellectual, or psychiatric disability.  We also support caregivers, entrepreneurs involved in the medical profession and anyone who is touched in any way by disabilities, chronic illnesses or one time medical needs.
teams.description:
Anyone who has an interest in disability issues or rights may join our team. This team was started as a way to find and keep track of Kiva entrepreneurs who are affected by illnesses or disabilities so that we might see what kind of difference we are making in the lives of these entrepreneurs. 

This team was originally created by a group of KivaFriends, but has always been open to anyone.  If you are interested, you can read about the team history here:

teams.description: We are women who know what we want and are creating the lives we always wanted.

teams.name: The Little Lebowski Urban Achievers (Dudeism)
teams.loan_because: We want to provide the necessary means for people to achieve and abide.
teams.description: We're disciples of The Church of the Latter-Day Dude (Dudeism), a religion inspired by The Big Lebowski, Taoism, humanism and more. Despite the name, our efforts are not confined to those living only in urban environments.

teams.loan_because: WE CAN!!!
teams.description: We believe in spreading the word of KIVA amongst friends and family, and that way expanding the help to those who need it. By helping others you create good karma and set a good example for others. Feel free to join!

teams.name: España - Spain
teams.loan_because: Kiva ofrece un medio ideal para participar activamente en el apoyo a emprendedores sin recursos que no pueden acceder a los canales normales de financiación y que, gracias a los micro-créditos, pueden  desarrollar una actividad empresarial que les permita, a ellos y su entorno, alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
teams.description:
Este club se creó con la intención inicial de fomentar la participación de españolas y españoles en Kiva, no obstante,  está abierto a todas las personas que deseen unirse a él, sin importar su nacionalidad ni ninguna otra condición.
 
El único referente identitario de este grupo es la solidaridad y la convicción de que, a través de Kiva, es posible el apoyo a personas o grupos emprendedores que buscan y merecen una oportunidad por su esfuerzo.

teams.name: Endangered Beekeepers
teams.loan_because: "We ought to do good to others as simply as a horse runs, or a bee makes honey, or a vine bears grapes season after season without thinking of the grapes it has borne."  -Marcus Aurelius
teams.description: We support honeybees, their keepers, and all who toil season after season to do good for the human hive.   Our team photo is of Carmen, a Peruvian beekeeper and Kiva loan recipient.

teams.name: Build India
teams.loan_because: We want to make a difference to Power Rural India.
teams.description:
We are committed to bring prosperity to rural India as we believe that insufficient resources to make a decent living in villages is the reason that most of our villagers migrate to cities aggravating the problems of already crowded cities. We aim to develop sustainable infrastructure in villages to improve the quality of life for people in Rural India.

We are currently interested in collaborating with individuals and companies interested in expanding the concept of integrating microfinance with renewable power generation to finance utility scale solar and wind power projects in India in association with KIVA

teams.name: Nicaragua
teams.loan_because:
Creemos que la microfinanza es un método viable para ayudarle a los Nicaragüenses a salir de la pobreza.

We believe in the capacity of microfinance to empower Nicaraguans to lift themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
Estamos unidos por un objetivo de proveer recursos financieros a través de Kiva para fomentar el desarrollo económico de los Nicaragüenses.

teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: KivaFriends.org
teams.loan_because: we are a diverse group of people with diverse reasons for participating on Kiva.org, but with a unifying desire to alleviate poverty around the world through making microloans to the hard working poor.
teams.description: We are a community for lenders by lenders. We welcome Kiva.org lenders to participate in our lender forums at KivaFriends.org

teams.name: LOTUS: Lend Out To Uplift Self-sufficiency
teams.loan_because: We care about people striving to enhance their economic self-sufficiency and wish to support their entrepreneurial endeavors. It just takes one small step by each of us lending on kiva. Together we can make it easier for hard working people to get the much-needed capital to sustain and grow their business. We feel blessed to be able to support the aspirations of so many loan recipients who persevere tenaciously for a better quality of life with dignity. Kudos to Kiva.org that allows us to connect for this common cause.
teams.description:
In our team, we have a vision to change lives in novel ways. Our team's origin began with a Kiva Card (gift certificate) whose recipient founded this team. Inspired by Kiva Fellow, Jessica Heinzelman's talk, our founder dreamed to take us on a cruise, beyond the realm of lending targets and team statistics. Frequent & occasional lenders are free to choose who to lend to, how much and when in an amiable team ambience nurtured by Kiva Fellows, Kiva Editor & Translators, artists, writers, entrepreneurs, workers, retired people, families, parent + kid(s), students, teachers, and professionals. Our diversity & portfolio enable our discovery of social values inherent in the Kiva micro-lending ecosystem whose issues we debate objectively. Experienced members are gratified to enhance our grasp of nuances in lending. We wish to work with volunteers in the team, Kiva Friends, http://kivafriends.org and our supporters to engage in activities that promote Kiva. Our journey to strengthen and grow the Kiva ecosystem has room for more. JOIN NOW, and check out our team, to convince yourself that it can be your team too.

LINKS TO SEE ALSO:
1. Kiva Updates:http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva 
2. KF Blogs:http://www.kiva.org/updates/fellows 

(Thanks Anh D Pham for letting LOTUS team on Kiva to use the exquisite image of the lotus flower you photographed in Vietnam)

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.description: A group of people from the social news website reddit - started not by reddit admins, but by redditors themselves.

teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Portugal
teams.loan_because:
Honramos o legado deixado pelos nossos antepassados que espalharam cultura, conhecimento e valores por todo o mundo. Onde há um português, há um amigo pronto a ajudar e dar esperança aos que mais precisam. Isto é Portugal.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
We honor the legacy of our ancestors who spread our culture, knowledge and values around the world. Wherever there is a Portuguese, there is a friend willing to help and give hope to those in need. This is Portugal.

teams.name: Guys holding fish
teams.loan_because: We feel an affinity for entrepreneurs that make their living by fishing, selling fish, or attempting to make their lives better because of their proximity to the ocean, or freshwater locales...
teams.description:
We love fish and/or fishing so much that many of us have chosen to present ourselves on KIVA with a photo of ourselves, holding a fish!  We welcome "gals" to join, as well, the name of the team notwithstanding...  

We certainly support "sustainable" fishing, but also recognize that sometimes, our "Western" views of resource management may not match the needs of the very desperate folks, in other countries, struggling to make a living, or even providing food for their families ...  Our intent is to help the struggling, without regard to their profession or trade.  We believe that our lending record well represents that goal, as we are a pretty diverse group, with very diverse lending interests....

teams.loan_because: We are a truly global community of business leaders dedicated to improving sustainable economic growth worldwide.
teams.description: Students, staff, profesors & alumni of Thunderbird, School of Global Management (#1 in International Business).

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

teams.loan_because: The development of information technology is essential for entrepeneurs all over our planet.
teams.description: We at Qaiku are the voice that answers when somebody is calling.

teams.name: Finland
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Finland

teams.name: DeutscheBank
teams.loan_because:
Each of us has the ability to help address poverty in a meaningful way and collectively we can positively impact social change.

Deutsche Bank has partnered with Kiva to provide US employees the opportunity to make loans to entrepreneurs of their choice. This capital will help borrowers improve their own lives and create sustainable income to support their families and their communities.

With full participation from our franchise, employees have the potential to impact more than 500,000 people in the developing world.
teams.description: For more than 20 years, Deutsche Bank has been a leader and trusted partner in the field of social finance. Leveraging its core capabilities as a global financial services firm, the Bank has financed opportunities to serve the poor ranging from affordable housing and microfinance to clean energy and healthcare. This collective work represents more than USD 2.5 billion in capital deployed. Deutsche Bank’s Global Social Investments group has relationships with over 120 microfinance institutions (MFIs) in 50 countries around the world. The Bank is committed to complying with laws prohibiting discrimination in lending.

teams.name: Team Japan
teams.loan_because: we feel that we can help the world, one person at a time.
teams.description:
There are many Kiva lenders who live in Japan, and we hope to be able to make a difference, not only as individuals, but now as a team. Please feel free to join us....not only from anywhere in Japan, but anywhere in the world. All you need is an interest in Japan. 

一緒に貧困をなくしましょう．．．お待ちしています！

(Picture: Mt. Fuji and the full moon at sunrise New Year's Day 2010 写真：朝日の富士山と満月２０１０年元日）

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Kiva Team Germany
teams.loan_because: Showing interest in the life of others and giving a helping hand if needed is important.
teams.description: We are some fellows from Germany who believe in the concept of Kiva.

teams.name: Hamburg
teams.loan_because: we believe that entrepreneurship can start with small steps and develop to support and enhance whole communities.
teams.description:
We are a team for everyone originating from or loving Hamburg, a beautiful city in northern Germany.
Ein Team für alle Hamburger Deerns un Jungs und alle die es gerne wären.

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: Ravelry.com
teams.loan_because: We want to support crafts people all over the world.
teams.description: We are a group of knitters and crocheters that want to support other crafts people around the world

teams.name: Crafty Bloggers
teams.loan_because: We can!
teams.description: We are a group of women who know each other through the internet. Many of us have never met in real life. We like to make things for our family and friends and sometimes to sell.

teams.name: Sawyer Hill EcoVillage
teams.description: Sawyer Hill EcoVillage is comprised of two cohousing neighborhoods, Camelot Cohousing and Mosaic Commons.  In cohousing each family owns their home, as well as a share of the common facilities, including things like playing fields, workshops and gardens. Members cook for each other and eat together 2-3 times a week.  Our community values green space, a safe, healthy environment for our children and conservation of our natural resources.

teams.name: Startup Founders - every individual and business has the power to make a difference
teams.loan_because: We all need to work together to make the world a better place.
teams.description: Startup Founders supporting fellow entrepreneurs thru microfinance to grow their businesses and make their lives and their world a better place

teams.name: Madison
teams.loan_because: We believe in the power of microloans to make a sustainable positive impact on the lives of entrepreneurs in the developing world.
teams.description: We share at least two things in common: (1) We believe in the power of Kiva to alleviate poverty and (2) we live in or have a connection to the great city of Madison, Wisconsin, USA

teams.name: ∞ Braincrave ∞
teams.loan_because: We believe the children are our future.  Teach them well and let them lead the way.  Show them all the beauty we possess inside.  You've got to give them a sense of pride.  To make it easier - let the children's laughter remind us how we used to be.
teams.description: We are the alpha and omega of all things Kiva.

teams.name: In Memory of Paul Lambert
teams.loan_because: We all want to remember Paul.
teams.description: Paul was a Volunteer Coordinator at Kiva.  He spoke four languages (English, French, Spanish and Russian).  He touched the lives of many through his work and the hearts of countless through his friendship.  We all miss him.

teams.name: Awesome Activity Accumulators
teams.loan_because: We are motivated to collect all of the different activities on kiva. Some people collect stamps, we collect the fields of human endeavor.

teams.name: Ireland
teams.loan_because: Small streams become mighty rivers.
teams.description: A group of Kiva Lenders from Ireland, or with links to Ireland. Feel free to join our community :)

http://goo.gl/LU3hzz

teams.name: Team Toronto
teams.loan_because: The people who are lucky enough to live in Toronto care about creating a self sustaining legacy in all parts of civilization, and wish that economic conditions in more of the world could be like they are here.
teams.description: This team began with one person, but soon gained strength and momentum through the generosity of the people of Toronto, Canada and their friends. Now this team has over 300 members, has loaned hundreds of thousands of dollars over the past six years and is helping people all over the world. Join us today!!

teams.name: Team German Rotaract, Inner Wheel and Rotary Clubs
teams.loan_because: we find the idea behind Kiva inspiring. We are convinced that microfinance is a very effective way of helping people to overcome long-term poverty. Let’s together empower people to realize their own business ideas  ... and dreams come true.
teams.description:
Rotarians provide humanitarian service, encourage high ethical standards in all vocations, and help build goodwill and peace in the world. 
The idea for this team was born in a club meeting of the RC Limburgerhof/Vorderpfalz and is open for all German Rotaract, Innerwheel and Rotary Clubs and their friends.

teams.name: Humans Against Unjust Capitalism
teams.whereabouts: Anyplace where there is a heart to give.
teams.loan_because: We believe in the beautiful fact that all humans are equal and should thus be treated so. Ergo, it is our utmost duty, as those who have been privileged from our forefathers greed, to give back our excess to those who it was originally taken from. In doing so, we hope to achieve a more balanced and equal world, that our children might not feel shame when they consider how we lived our lives.
teams.description: Small yet Dedicated

teams.name: New York

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com

teams.description: Arguably the finest assemblage of people who have never met dedicated to the common purpose of hastening global peace in $25 increments.

teams.name: University of Nevada, Reno
teams.loan_because: we understand that other people in the world are not as fortunate as we are and that they deserve a chance at having a successful life, too.
teams.description: We are a group of former and current University of Nevada, Reno students who are committed to making an impact in the world one person at a time.

teams.name: Beer Goggles Never Lie... much
teams.whereabouts: with a coldie in one hand and a hottie in the other... maybe
teams.loan_because:
We love a beer, and we love to loan. Coincidence? I think not!
By the way, I lurv what you've done with your hair...
teams.description:
Saving the world, one beer (and loan) at a time. Errrrrrrrr, it's your shout, round, whatevaaaaaa... mine's a lager thanks.



Beer is your friend... SO GET IT INTA YAAAAAAAAAA!!!


Beauty is in the eye of the BEER HOLDER...

teams.name: PLP @ CNU
teams.loan_because: PLP Team Members: Help us define our team mission!  Send your suggestions for "We loan because..." to katherine.sheridan@cnu.edu.
teams.description: The PLP @ CNU - the President's Leadership Program at Christopher Newport University - is a team of students who are actively engaged in learning about leadership through academic study, service to community, leadership development, and individual & academic success.  Our Kiva team is an effort to serve the international community to inspire hope and success across the globe.

teams.name: Next Gener.Asian Church For Kiva
teams.loan_because:
we want to see the kingdom of heaven on earth.
"From the fullness of his grace we have all received one blessing after another." (Jn 1:16) And so we give because we have received, and in the case of many Asian American Christians, we have been given more than than enough.

teams.name: Mennonite Church USA/Canada
teams.loan_because: "The King will reply, 'Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers and sisters of mine, you did for me.' (Matt. 25:40 TNIV)

teams.name: Africa
teams.loan_because:
We believe micro lending is one of the best & most sustainable ways to end extreme poverty in the world, and are drawn to empowering entrepreneurs in Africa because it is the most disadvantaged socio-economic demographic group in the world.

Check out this great TED talk on the solution for Africa: http://www.ted.com/talks/lang/eng/andrew_mwenda_takes_a_new_look_at_africa.html

teams.name: Kiva Team Captains
teams.loan_because: We want to bring people together to raise awareness about Kiva in our communities.
teams.description: This group is about empowering Team Captains to become Community Marketers.  It is our goal to provide Kiva's biggest advocates with more tools to spread the word about Kiva.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Go New Mexico!
teams.loan_because: We are from Albuquerque,  Santa Fe, Belen, Las Cruces, Corrales, Gallup, Hobbs, Placitas, Farmington, Rio Rancho, Silver City and all around the beautiful state of New Mexico and we want to create opportunity for others.  Go New Mexico!

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Netherlands
teams.loan_because: het mensen helpt een zelfstandig bestaan op te bouwen.
teams.description: FairSpirit microkrediet promoot Kiva in Nederland. Doe jij ook mee met het FairSpirit team?

teams.name: Berlin
teams.loan_because: it feels right.
teams.description: We are people from or connected with Berlin, Germany's most beautiful city and capital, who have been lucky enough to discover Kiva.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

Field Partners - Social and Secular Ratings:
www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

***OTHER RESOURCES:***
Starfish List:
http://starfish.dynalias.org/

KivaLens:
http://www.kivalens.org/

KivaTools:
http://kivatools.com/

Toolkit for analyzing Kiva data:
http://build.kiva.org/

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm
Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kfpc/
http://www.kivalens.org

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.name: Belgium
teams.loan_because: Its a nice way to help the beneficiaries of the loans create their own business and hopefully improve their lives.
teams.description: Team of the Belgian citizens & residents and of the fans of Belgian Waffles, Chocolate & Beers !

We strongly belive in that even small things could change the world.
